functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"potion",Rarity:"leg",Effect:"str4",display:{Name:"\"§6Puissance Ineffable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Faites exploser votre force,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7au prix d'une insatiable faim.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Explode your strength,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7at the cost of insatiable hunger.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a4\"}"]},CustomPotionColor:4738620,custom_potion_effects:[{id:instant_health,amplifier:1,duration:2,show_particles:0b}]}

{EquipmentType:"potion",Rarity:"leg",Effect:"str3_res1_luc2",display:{Name:"\"§6Nectar somptueux\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Boisson légendaire royale dont seul les plus\"}","{\"text\":\"§7fortunés ont la chance d'y gouter.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Legendary royal drink which only\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the wealthy have the chance to taste.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7RES§a1 §7LUC§a2\"}"]},CustomPotionColor:16187275,custom_potion_effects:[{id:instant_health,amplifier:7,duration:0,show_particles:0b},{id:night_vision,amplifier:0,duration:1200,show_particles:0b},{id:fire_resistance,amplifier:0,duration:400,show_particles:0b}]}
